title: Minecraft Animation - TEAM CRAFTED IS HERE!
author: 星E君
txt_content:

ALL OF YOUR FAVORITE MINECRAFTERS UNDER ONE ROOF! LET THE SHENANIGANS BEGIN! 
 所有你最喜欢的Minecraft实况主都在这里！（籽岷？秋风？不认识）让我们的计划开始吧！

CHECK OUT THE TEAM CRAFTED HUB CHANNEL! (Subscribe for IRL Skits, Vlogs and more!)
打开我们的Youtube屏道并且订阅吧！！：
http://www.youtube.com/teamcrafted

VISIT US AT THE TEAM CRAFTED WEBSITE!
来看看我们的官网吧：
http://www.teamcrafted.com
